title: Drawing Application Workflow
goal: Verify core drawing functionality including pencil tool, color selection, and file persistence.

steps.expected: Application window opens with a canvas area, a toolbar, and a color selector visible.

steps.action: Click the Pencil tool button on the toolbar
steps.expected: The pencil tool becomes active for drawing.

steps.action: Select a color using the color selector
steps.expected: The active drawing color is updated to the chosen selection.

steps.action: Click and drag on the canvas
steps.expected: A stroke is rendered on the canvas in the selected color.

steps.action: Click the Save button on the toolbar
steps.expected: The current canvas content is saved to a file.
